arts.ttl: Chelsea open Champions League campaign with victory over Real Madrid
arts.sum: Goals from Sjoeke Nusken, Guro Reiten and Mayra Ramirez earned them a 3-2 victory.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Real Madrid LIVE: Women’s Champions League team news and line-ups from Stamford Bridge fixture
arts.sum: Sonia Bompastor takes charge of Chelsea for the first time at Stamford Bridge as the Blues welcome Real Madrid

arts.ttl: Millie Bright warns against underestimating Champions League opponents
arts.sum: Chelsea have played Real Madrid in the group stage in each of the last two seasons, resulting in two draws and two wins in the club's favour, ultimately remaining unbeaten against the Spanish side. Speaking ahead of the game, Bright reinforced that the fixture is "absolutely not" the decider in their group, which will also see Chelsea come up against Celtic and FC Twente later on.

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss admits 'disappointment' over controversial Man United postponement
arts.sum: Chelsea boss Sonia Bompastor admits she was "disappointed" by the late decision to postpone their Women's Super League (WSL) match against Manchester United. Bompastor's side face Real Madrid in the group stage of the competition on Tuesday, just two days after the United game was supposed to take place.

arts.ttl: Preview: Chelsea Women vs. Real Madrid Femenino - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's Women's Champions League clash between Chelsea Women and Real Madrid Femenino, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
